name: I SAW it coming
description:
Small prototype for a puzzle game, made with <3 in less than 48h for a game-jam with the theme "Collaborate... apart".

I SAW it coming!

To escape the facility, you're going to need some help! You're all alone in here... but what if...?

Create clones of your past self, and use them to open your way to freedom!

But beware! Your clones are not as harmless as you expected!

Controls:

- Arrow keys to move around

- Space to create a clone of yourself

- Avoid the pits, push the buttons by standing on them, create lots of clones and avoid touching them!
